subject: fix(activity): hide entire activity section when printing
body:
Cross-origin iframes render as empty boxes in print. Wrap the full
Activity section (heading included) with no-print so it's cleanly
excluded. Revert the about text to avoid referencing charts that
won't appear in the printed version.

Tags: fix, print, activity
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: cv-content
Semver: patch
